description:
In this makeup course you will learn all the tips and tricks to applying makeup like a professional makeup artist.  

      • You will learn:

        1. How to create a flawless canvas
        2. How to work with color correctors and why 
        3. How to find the best color for your skin tone 
        4. How to create a natural look 
        5. How to create a glamorous look 
        6. How to apply blush based on face shape 
        7. How to contour and highlight like a professional
        8. How to take your look from day to night
        9. How to create different looks for different clients
        10. The benefits of primer
        11. Application tips and tricks
This course will give you a better understanding of where to apply makeup and why as well as tips used on models and celebrities on shoots.
title: How To Apply Makeup Like a Pro
